blocks.name: df-cncf
blocks.content: Define the operation whose value is a class of continuous complex functions. (Contributed by Paul Chapman, 11-Oct-2007.)
blocks.origin:
axiom df-cncf(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, setvar s3, setvar s4, setvar s5, setvar s6) {
  |- wceq(ccncf, cmpo(s0, s1, cpw(cc), cpw(cc), crab(s2, co(cv(s1), cmap, cv(s0)), wral(s3, cv(s0), wral(s4, crp, wrex(s5, crp, wral(s6, cv(s0), wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s3), cmin, cv(s6))), clt, cv(s5)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(s2), cv(s3)), cmin, cfv(cv(s2), cv(s6)))), clt, cv(s4))))))))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s5)
  -| diffss(s0, s4)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s0, s3)
  -| diffss(s0, s6)
  -| diffss(s1, s5)
  -| diffss(s1, s4)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s3)
  -| diffss(s1, s6)
  -| diffss(s4, s5)
  -| diffss(s2, s5)
  -| diffss(s3, s5)
  -| diffss(s5, s6)
  -| diffss(s2, s4)
  -| diffss(s3, s4)
  -| diffss(s4, s6)
  -| diffss(s2, s3)
  -| diffss(s2, s6)
  -| diffss(s3, s6)
}

thm dfii3(class c0) {
  |- wceq(cii, co(c0, crest, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  -| wceq(c0, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
} = {
  eqcomi(cii, co(c0, crest, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))
  mp2an(wceq(co(c0, crest, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)), cii), wcel(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(cxmet, cc)), wss(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cc))
  cnxmet()
  sstri(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), cc, cr)
  unitssre()
  ax-resscn()
  metrest(ccom(cabs, cmin), cc, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), c0, cii, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  eqid(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(nat0, cicc, nat1))))
  cnfldtopn(c0)
  df-ii()
}

  cncfval(hs0, s0, s1, s2, s3, c0, c1)
  elrab(hs0, c2, co(c1, cmap, c0), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, crp, wral(s3, c0, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s3))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(cv(hs0), cv(s3)))), clt, cv(s1))))))), wral(s0, c0, wral(s1, crp, wrex(s2, crp, wral(s3, c0, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(s0), cmin, cv(s3))), clt, cv(s2)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c2, cv(s0)), cmin, cfv(c2, cv(s3)))), clt, cv(s1))))))))

blocks.name: cncfss
blocks.content: The set of continuous functions is expanded when the range is expanded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm cncfss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc)), wss(co(c2, ccncf, c0), co(c2, ccncf, c1)))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, co(c2, ccncf, c0), co(c2, ccncf, c1), wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc)))
  ex(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ccncf, c0)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ccncf, c1)))
  mpbird(wa(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ccncf, c0))), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ccncf, c1)), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1))
  fssd(cv(hs0), c2, c1, c0, wa(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ccncf, c0))))
  adantl(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc)), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ccncf, c0)), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c0))
  cncff(cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  simpll(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ccncf, c0)))
  adantll(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc), wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ccncf, c0)), wb(wcel(cv(hs0), co(c2, ccncf, c1)), wf(cv(hs0), c2, c1)))
  cncffvrn(c1, cv(hs0), c2, c0)
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, ccncf, c0))
  diff.hs0.c(co(c2, ccncf, c1))
  diff.hs0.w(wa(wss(c0, c1), wss(c1, cc)))
}

thm cncfss(class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ)→(c2[-cn->]c0)⊆(c2[-cn->]c1))
} = {
  ssrdv(hs0, (c2[-cn->]c0), (c2[-cn->]c1), (c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ))
  ex((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ), hs0 ∈(c2[-cn->]c0), hs0 ∈(c2[-cn->]c1))
  mpbird(((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ)∧ hs0 ∈(c2[-cn->]c0)), hs0 ∈(c2[-cn->]c1), (hs0 : c2 → c1))
  fssd(hs0, c2, c1, c0, ((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ)∧ hs0 ∈(c2[-cn->]c0)))
  adantl((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ), hs0 ∈(c2[-cn->]c0), (hs0 : c2 → c0))
  cncff(hs0, c2, c0)
  simpll(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ ℂ, hs0 ∈(c2[-cn->]c0))
  adantll(c0 ⊆ c1, c1 ⊆ ℂ, hs0 ∈(c2[-cn->]c0), (hs0 ∈(c2[-cn->]c1)↔(hs0 : c2 → c1)))
  cncffvrn(c1, hs0, c2, c0)

  diff.hs0.w((c0 ⊆ c1 ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ))
}

thm climcncf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wbr(ccom(c0, c1), cli, cfv(c0, c2)))

  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, c5))
} = {
  climcn1(hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, ccom(c0, c1), c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c1, universe, w0)
  syldan(w0, wcel(cv(hs2), c5), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cc), wcel(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), c6))

  syl2anc(w0, wcel(ccom(c0, c1), universe), wcel(c0, co(c5, ccncf, c6)), wcel(c1, universe))
  sylancl(w0, wcel(c1, universe), wf(c1, c3, c5), wcel(c3, universe))
  fvexi(c3, cuz, c4)
  fex(c1, c3, c5, universe)
  coexg(c0, co(c5, ccncf, c6), c1, universe)
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs2, c5, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs2), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(c0, c2))), clt, cv(hs0))))))
  syl2anc(w0, wi(wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs2, c5, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs2), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(c0, c2))), clt, cv(hs0)))))), wcel(c0, co(c5, ccncf, c6)), wcel(c2, c5))
  3expia(wcel(c0, co(c5, ccncf, c6)), wcel(c2, c5), wcel(cv(hs0), crp), wrex(hs1, crp, wral(hs2, c5, wi(wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cv(hs2), cmin, c2)), clt, cv(hs1)), wbr(cfv(cabs, co(cfv(c0, cv(hs2)), cmin, cfv(c0, c2))), clt, cv(hs0))))))
  cncfi(hs1, hs2, c0, c5, c6, c2, cv(hs0))
  ffvelrnda(cv(hs3), c3, c1, c5, w0)
  sylan(w0, wcel(cv(hs3), c3), wceq(cfv(ccom(c0, c1), cv(hs3)), cfv(c0, cfv(c1, cv(hs3)))), wf(c1, c3, c5))
  fvco3(c1, c3, c5, cv(hs3), c0)

  diff.hs0.s(hs1)

thm climcncf(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(c0 ∘ c1)[~~>](c0 ` c2))
  ⊣ c3 =(ℤ≥ ` c4)
  ⊣ (w0 → c4 ∈ ℤ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ∈(c5[-cn->]c6))
  ⊣ (w0 →(c1 : c3 → c5))
  ⊣ (w0 → c1[~~>]c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈ c5)
} = {
  climcn1(hs2, hs0, hs1, hs3, (c0 ∘ c1), c0, c2, c3, c4, c5, c1, universe, w0)
  syldan(w0, hs2 ∈ c5, (c0 ` hs2)∈ ℂ, (c0 ` hs2)∈ c6)
  ffvelrnda(hs2, c5, c0, c6, w0)
  syl(w0, (c0 : c5 → c6), c0 ∈(c5[-cn->]c6))
  cncff(c0, c5, c6)
  sselda((c0 ` hs2), c6, cc, w0)
  syl(w0, c6 ⊆ ℂ, c0 ∈(c5[-cn->]c6))
  cncfrss2(c0, c5, c6)
  syl2anc(w0, (c0 ∘ c1)∈ 𝕌, c0 ∈(c5[-cn->]c6), c1 ∈ 𝕌)
  sylancl(w0, c1 ∈ 𝕌, (c1 : c3 → c5), c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  fvexi(c3, cuz, c4)
  fex(c1, c3, c5, universe)
  coexg(c0, (c5[-cn->]c6), c1, universe)
  imp(w0, hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs2 ∈ c5,((abs `(hs2[-]c2))[<]hs1 →(abs `((c0 ` hs2)[-](c0 ` c2)))[<]hs0))))
  syl2anc(w0, (hs0 ∈ ℝ+ → ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs2 ∈ c5,((abs `(hs2[-]c2))[<]hs1 →(abs `((c0 ` hs2)[-](c0 ` c2)))[<]hs0)))), c0 ∈(c5[-cn->]c6), c2 ∈ c5)
  3expia(c0 ∈(c5[-cn->]c6), c2 ∈ c5, hs0 ∈ ℝ+, ∃(hs1 ∈ ℝ+, ∀(hs2 ∈ c5,((abs `(hs2[-]c2))[<]hs1 →(abs `((c0 ` hs2)[-](c0 ` c2)))[<]hs0))))
  cncfi(hs1, hs2, c0, c5, c6, c2, hs0)
  ffvelrnda(hs3, c3, c1, c5, w0)
  sylan(w0, hs3 ∈ c3, ((c0 ∘ c1)` hs3)=(c0 `(c1 ` hs3)), (c1 : c3 → c5))
  fvco3(c1, c3, c5, hs3, c0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs0)
  diff.hs2.s(hs1)
  diff.hs2.s(hs3)
  diff.hs0.s(hs1)
  diff.hs0.s(hs3)
  diff.hs1.s(hs3)
  diff.hs2.c(c0)
  diff.hs2.c(c2)
  diff.hs2.c(c5)
  diff.hs2.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.c((c0 ∘ c1))
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c0)
  diff.hs1.c(c2)
  diff.hs1.c(c3)
  diff.hs1.c(c1)

  diff.hs3.c(c5)
  diff.hs3.c(c1)
  diff.hs2.w(w0)
  diff.hs0.w(w0)
  diff.hs1.w(w0)
  diff.hs3.w(w0)

  diff.hs1.c(c5)

thm cncfmet(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ)→(c0[-cn->]c1)=(c2[Cn]c3))
  ⊣ c4 =((abs ∘ -)|`(c0 × c0))
  ⊣ c5 =((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1))
  ⊣ c2 =(MetOpen ` c4)
  ⊣ c3 =(MetOpen ` c5)
} = {

blocks.name: cncfcn
blocks.content: Relate complex function continuity to topological continuity. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 17-Feb-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm cncfcn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wss(c0, cc), wss(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c0, ccncf, c1), co(c2, ccn, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  -| wceq(c2, co(c4, crest, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c4, crest, c1))
} = {
  eqtr4d(co(c0, ccncf, c1), co(c2, ccn, c3), co(cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c0, c0))), ccn, cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1)))), wa(wss(c0, cc), wss(c1, cc)))
  cncfmet(c0, c1, cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c0, c0))), cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1))), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c0, c0)), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1)))
  oveq12d(c2, ccn, c3, cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c0, c0))), cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1))), wa(wss(c0, cc), wss(c1, cc)))
  syl5eq(c2, cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c0, c0))), co(c4, crest, c0), wa(wss(c0, cc), wss(c1, cc)))
  sylancr(wa(wss(c0, cc), wss(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c4, crest, c0), cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c0, c0)))), wcel(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(cxmet, cc)), wss(c0, cc))
  simpl(wss(c0, cc), wss(c1, cc))
  metrest(ccom(cabs, cmin), cc, c0, c4, cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c0, c0))), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c0, c0)))
  eqid(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c0, c0)))
  eqid(cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c0, c0))))
  syl5eq(c3, cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1))), co(c4, crest, c1), wa(wss(c0, cc), wss(c1, cc)))
  sylancr(wa(wss(c0, cc), wss(c1, cc)), wceq(co(c4, crest, c1), cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1)))), wcel(ccom(cabs, cmin), cfv(cxmet, cc)), wss(c1, cc))
  cnxmet()
  simpr(wss(c0, cc), wss(c1, cc))
  metrest(ccom(cabs, cmin), cc, c1, c4, cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1))), cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1)))
  eqid(cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1)))
  cnfldtopn(c4)
  eqid(cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(c1, c1))))
}

  ⊢ ((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ)→(c0[-cn->]c1)=(c2[Cn]c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)

} = {

  cncfmet(c0, c1, (MetOpen `((abs ∘ -)|`(c0 × c0))), (MetOpen `((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1))), ((abs ∘ -)|`(c0 × c0)), ((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1)))
  oveq12d(c2, ccn, c3, (MetOpen `((abs ∘ -)|`(c0 × c0))), (MetOpen `((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1))), (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ))
  syl5eq(c2, (MetOpen `((abs ∘ -)|`(c0 × c0))), (c4[|`t]c0), (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ))
  sylancr((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ), (c4[|`t]c0)=(MetOpen `((abs ∘ -)|`(c0 × c0))), (abs ∘ -)∈(*Met ` ℂ), c0 ⊆ ℂ)
  simpl(c0 ⊆ ℂ, c1 ⊆ ℂ)
  metrest((abs ∘ -), cc, c0, c4, (MetOpen `((abs ∘ -)|`(c0 × c0))), ((abs ∘ -)|`(c0 × c0)))
  eqid(((abs ∘ -)|`(c0 × c0)))
  eqid((MetOpen `((abs ∘ -)|`(c0 × c0))))
  syl5eq(c3, (MetOpen `((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1))), (c4[|`t]c1), (c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ))
  sylancr((c0 ⊆ ℂ ∧ c1 ⊆ ℂ), (c4[|`t]c1)=(MetOpen `((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1))), (abs ∘ -)∈(*Met ` ℂ), c1 ⊆ ℂ)
  cnxmet()

  metrest((abs ∘ -), cc, c1, c4, (MetOpen `((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1))), ((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1)))
  eqid(((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1)))
  cnfldtopn(c4)
  eqid((MetOpen `((abs ∘ -)|`(c1 × c1))))

blocks.name: cncfmptc
blocks.content: A constant function is a continuous function on ` CC ` . (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 7-Sep-2015.)

thm cncfmptc(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wi(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cc), wss(c1, cc)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c2, c0), co(c2, ccncf, c1)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
} = {
  eleqtrrd(cmpt(s0, c2, c0), co(c2, ccncf, c1), co(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c2), ccn, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1)), w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cc), wss(c1, cc)))
  cnmptc(s0, c2, c0, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c2), co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1), c1, w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cc), wss(c1, cc)))
  sylancr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cc), wss(c1, cc)), wcel(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c2), cfv(ctopon, c2)), wcel(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), cfv(ctopon, cc)), wss(c2, cc))
  simp2(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cc), wss(c1, cc))
  resttopon(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), cc, c2)
  sylancr(w3a(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cc), wss(c1, cc)), wcel(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1), cfv(ctopon, c1)), wcel(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), cfv(ctopon, cc)), wss(c1, cc))
  cnfldtopon(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  simp3(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cc), wss(c1, cc))
  resttopon(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), cc, c1)
  simp1(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cc), wss(c1, cc))
  3adant1(wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cc), wss(c1, cc), wceq(co(c2, ccncf, c1), co(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c2), ccn, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1))))
  cncfcn(c2, c1, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c2), co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1), cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  eqid(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c2))
  eqid(co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1))
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, c1)
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopn, ccnfld)
  diff.ctopn.s(s0)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s0)
  diff.crest.s(s0)
  diff.w3a.s(s0, wcel(c0, c1), wss(c2, cc), wss(c1, cc))
  diff.wcel.s(s0, c0, c1)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c2, cc)
  diff.wss.s(s0, c1, cc)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

thm cncfmpt1f(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, wff w0) {

thm cncfmpt2ss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {

  cncff(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c0, c4)
  fvmptelrn(s0, c0, c3, c4, w0)
  syl(w0, wf(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0, c4), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), co(c0, ccncf, c4)))
  cncff(cmpt(s0, c0, c3), c0, c4)
  sylancr(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c0, ccncf, c4)), wf(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), c0, c4)), wss(c4, cc), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, co(c1, c2, c3)), co(c0, ccncf, cc)))

thm cncfmpt2ss(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦(c1[c2]c3))∈(c0[-cn->]c4))
  ⊣ c5 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
  ⊣ c2 ∈((c5[tX]c5)[Cn]c5)

  cncfmpt2f(s0, c0, c1, c2, c3, c5, w0)

thm addccncf(setvar s0, class c0, class c1) {
  |- wi(wcel(c0, cc), wcel(c1, co(cc, ccncf, cc)))

thm cncfcnvcn(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  ⊢ ((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3))→((c1 : c2 ↔ c3)↔ `' c1 ∈(c3[-cn->]c2)))
  ⊣ c4 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)

} = {
  3bitr4d((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)), (c1 : c2 ↔ c3), `' c1 ∈(c3[-cn->]c2), c1 ∈(c0[Homeo](c4[|`t]c3)), `' c1 ∈((c4[|`t]c3)[Cn]c0))

  baib(c1 ∈(c0[Cn](c4[|`t]c3)), c1 ∈(c0[Homeo](c4[|`t]c3)), `' c1 ∈((c4[|`t]c3)[Cn]c0))
  ishmeo(c1, c0, (c4[|`t]c3))
  3bitr4d((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)), (c1 : c2 ↔ c3), c1 ∈(c0[Homeo](c4[|`t]c3)), (c1 : c2 ↔ ⋃(c4[|`t]c3)), (c1 : ⋃ c0 ↔ ⋃(c4[|`t]c3)))
  f1oeq2d(c1, c2, ⋃(c4[|`t]c3), ⋃ c0, (c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)))
  syl6eqr(c2, ⋃ c0, ⋃(c4[|`t]c2), (c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)))
  sylancr((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)), c2 = ⋃(c4[|`t]c2), c4 ∈ Top, c2 ⊆ ℂ)
  restuni(c4, c2, cc)
  unieqi(c0, (c4[|`t]c2))
  f1oeq3d(c1, c2, c3, ⋃(c4[|`t]c3), (c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)))
  sylancr((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)), c3 = ⋃(c4[|`t]c3), c4 ∈ Top, c3 ⊆ ℂ)
  cnfldtop(c4)
  restuni(c4, c3, cc)
  toponunii(cc, c4)
  cnfldtopon(c4)
  syl3anc((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)), (c1 ∈(c0[Homeo](c4[|`t]c3))↔(c1 : ⋃ c0 ↔ ⋃(c4[|`t]c3))), c0 ∈ Comp, (c4[|`t]c3)∈ Haus, c1 ∈(c0[Cn](c4[|`t]c3)))
  simpl(c0 ∈ Comp, c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3))
  sylancr((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)), (c4[|`t]c3)∈ Haus, c4 ∈ Haus, c3 ∈ 𝕌)
  cnfldhaus(c4)
  syl((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)), c3 ∈ 𝕌, c3 ⊆ ℂ)

  cnex()
  resthaus(c4, c3, universe)
  eleqtrd(c1, (c0[Cn](c4[|`t]c3)), (c2[-cn->]c3), (c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)))
  simpr(c0 ∈ Comp, c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3))
  syl2anc((c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)), (c2[-cn->]c3)=(c0[Cn](c4[|`t]c3)), c2 ⊆ ℂ, c3 ⊆ ℂ)
  cncfcn(c2, c3, c0, (c4[|`t]c3), c4)
  cmphaushmeo(c0, (c4[|`t]c3), c1, ⋃ c0, ⋃(c4[|`t]c3))
  eqid(⋃ c0)
  eqid(⋃(c4[|`t]c3))
  eleq2d(`' c1, (c3[-cn->]c2), ((c4[|`t]c3)[Cn]c0), (c0 ∈ Comp ∧ c1 ∈(c2[-cn->]c3)))

thm cnmptre(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c3)))
  -| wceq(c4, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  -| wceq(c2, co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), crest, c0))
  -| wceq(c3, co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), crest, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c0, cr))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, cr))
  -| wi(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s0), c0)), wcel(c1, c5))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, cc, c1), co(c4, ccn, c4)))
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
} = {
  eleqtrd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c3), co(c2, ccn, co(c4, crest, c5)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, co(c4, crest, c5))), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c4)))
  eleqtrd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c4), co(co(c4, crest, c0), ccn, c4), w0)
  cnmpt1res(s0, c0, c1, co(c4, crest, c0), c4, c4, cc, w0)
  eqid(co(c4, crest, c0))
  a1i(w0, wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, cc)))
  syl6ss(c0, cc, cr, w0)
  oveq1d(co(c4, crest, c0), ccn, c4, c2, w0)
  syl6eqr(co(c4, crest, c0), c2, co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), crest, c0), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c4, crest, c0), co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), crest, c0)), wss(c0, cr))
  rerest(c0, c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  mp3an2i(w0, wb(wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, c4)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), co(c2, ccn, co(c4, crest, c5)))), wcel(c4, cfv(ctopon, cc)), wss(crn(cmpt(s0, c0, c1)), c5), wss(c5, cc))
  cnfldtopon(c4)
  frnd(cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c5, c0, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, c5, w0)
  syl6ss(c5, cc, cr, w0)
  ax-resscn()
  cnrest2(c4, cc, cmpt(s0, c0, c1), c5, c2)
  oveq2d(c2, ccn, co(c4, crest, c5), c3, w0)
  syl6eqr(co(c4, crest, c5), c3, co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), crest, c5), w0)
  syl(w0, wceq(co(c4, crest, c5), co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), crest, c5)), wss(c5, cr))
  rerest(c5, c4, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  eqid(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

thm cnmptre(setvar s0, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 →(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c2[Cn]c3))
  ⊣ c4 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
  ⊣ c2 =((topGen ` ran((,)))[|`t]c0)
  ⊣ c3 =((topGen ` ran((,)))[|`t]c5)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ⊆ ℝ)
  ⊣ ((w0 ∧ s0 ∈ c0)→ c1 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ (w0 →(s0 ∈ ℂ ↦ c1)∈(c4[Cn]c4))
  ⊣ d(s0, c0)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
} = {
  eleqtrd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (c2[Cn]c3), (c2[Cn](c4[|`t]c5)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c2[Cn](c4[|`t]c5)), (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c2[Cn]c4))
  eleqtrd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), (c2[Cn]c4), ((c4[|`t]c0)[Cn]c4), w0)
  cnmpt1res(s0, c0, c1, (c4[|`t]c0), c4, c4, cc, w0)
  eqid((c4[|`t]c0))
  a1i(w0, c4 ∈(TopOn ` ℂ))
  syl6ss(c0, cc, cr, w0)
  oveq1d((c4[|`t]c0), ccn, c4, c2, w0)
  syl6eqr((c4[|`t]c0), c2, ((topGen ` ran((,)))[|`t]c0), w0)
  syl(w0, (c4[|`t]c0)=((topGen ` ran((,)))[|`t]c0), c0 ⊆ ℝ)
  rerest(c0, c4, (topGen ` ran((,))))
  mp3an2i(w0, ((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c2[Cn]c4)↔(s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1)∈(c2[Cn](c4[|`t]c5))), c4 ∈(TopOn ` ℂ), ran((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1))⊆ c5, c5 ⊆ ℂ)
  cnfldtopon(c4)
  frnd((s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c5, c0, w0)
  fmpttd(s0, c0, c1, c5, w0)
  syl6ss(c5, cc, cr, w0)
  ax-resscn()
  cnrest2(c4, cc, (s0 ∈ c0 ↦ c1), c5, c2)
  oveq2d(c2, ccn, (c4[|`t]c5), c3, w0)
  syl6eqr((c4[|`t]c5), c3, ((topGen ` ran((,)))[|`t]c5), w0)
  syl(w0, (c4[|`t]c5)=((topGen ` ran((,)))[|`t]c5), c5 ⊆ ℝ)
  rerest(c5, c4, (topGen ` ran((,))))
  eqid((topGen ` ran((,))))
  diff.cc.s(s0)
}

thm iocopnst(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3) {

  -| wceq(c3, cfv(cmopn, cres(ccom(cabs, cmin), cxp(co(c0, cicc, c1), co(c0, cicc, c1)))))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, co(c0, cico, c1)), wcel(co(c2, cioc, c1), c3))
  eleqtrrd(co(c2, cioc, c1), c3, co(cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)), crest, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wcel(c2, co(c0, cico, c1))))

blocks.name: icchmeo
blocks.content: The natural bijection from ` [ 0 , 1 ] ` to an arbitrary nontrivial closed interval ` [ A , B ] ` is a homeomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 8-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:

blocks.name: icopnfhmeo
blocks.content: The defined bijection from ` [ 0 , 1 ) ` to ` [ 0 , +oo ) ` is an order isomorphism and a homeomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: xrhmeo
blocks.content: The bijection from ` [ -u 1 , 1 ] ` to the extended reals is an order isomorphism and a homeomorphism. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: xrhmph
blocks.content: The extended reals are homeomorphic to the interval ` [ 0 , 1 ] ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm xrhmph() {

  mp2an(wbr(cneg(nat1), clt, nat1), wbr(cneg(nat1), clt, nat0), wbr(nat0, clt, nat1))
  neg1lt0()
  0lt1()
  lttri(cneg(nat1), nat0, nat1)
  neg1rr()
  0re()
  1re()
  icchmeo(hs0, cneg(nat1), nat1, cmpt(hs0, co(nat0, cicc, nat1), co(co(cv(hs0), cmul, nat1), caddc, co(co(nat1, cmin, cv(hs0)), cmul, cneg(nat1)))), cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))

blocks.name: xrcmp
blocks.content: The topology of the extended reals is compact. Since the topology of the extended reals extends the topology of the reals (by ~ xrtgioo ), this means that ` RR* ` is a compactification of ` RR ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: xrconn
blocks.content: The topology of the extended reals is connected. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 9-Sep-2015.)

blocks.name: icccvx
blocks.content: A linear combination of two reals lies in the interval between them. Equivalently, a closed interval is a convex set. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 2-Sep-2009.)
blocks.origin:
thm icccvx(class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), wi(w3a(wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c4, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wcel(co(co(co(nat1, cmin, c4), cmul, c2), caddc, co(c4, cmul, c3)), co(c0, cicc, c1))))
} = {
  ex(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), w3a(wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c4, co(nat0, cicc, nat1))), wcel(co(co(co(nat1, cmin, c4), cmul, c2), caddc, co(c4, cmul, c3)), co(c0, cicc, c1)))
  mpjao3dan(wa(wa(wcel(c0, cr), wcel(c1, cr)), w3a(wcel(c2, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c3, co(c0, cicc, c1)), wcel(c4, co(nat0, cicc, nat1)))), wcel(co(co(co(nat1, cmin, c4), cmul, c2), caddc, co(c4, cmul, c3)), co(c0, cicc, c1)), wbr(c2, clt, c3), wceq(c2, c3), wbr(c3, clt, c2))

blocks.name: oprpiece1res1
blocks.content: Restriction to the first part of a piecewise defined function. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oprpiece1res1(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7) {
  |- wceq(cres(c0, cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), c4)
  -| wcel(c1, cr)
  -| wcel(c5, cr)

  -| wcel(c7, universe)

  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), c3, c6))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(cres(c0, cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), c4), wcel(c6, universe))
  a1ii(wceq(cres(c0, cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), c4), wcel(c7, universe))
  3eqtr4i(cres(c0, cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), c4, cres(cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c5), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2))), cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2))))
  mp2an(wceq(cres(cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c5), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2))), cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2)))), wss(co(c1, cicc, c2), co(c1, cicc, c5)), wss(c3, c3))

  lbicc2(c1, c5)
  iccss2(c1, c1, c5, c2)
  ssid(c3)
  resmpt2(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), co(c1, cicc, c5), c3, c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2)))
  reseq1i(c0, cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3), cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c5), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2))))
  eqtr4i(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2))), cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), c3, c6))

  adantr(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2)), c6))
  iftrued(c6, c7, wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2))
  mp3an12(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2), wcel(c1, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr))
  rexri(c1)
  ax-mp(wcel(c2, cxr), wcel(c2, co(c1, cicc, c5)))
  eliccxr(c2, c1, c5)
  iccleub(c1, c2, cv(s0))
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cicc, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cicc, c5)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, cicc, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, cicc, c5)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: oprpiece1res2
blocks.content: Restriction to the second part of a piecewise defined function. (Contributed by Jeff Madsen, 11-Jun-2010.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 3-Sep-2015.)
blocks.origin:
thm oprpiece1res2(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, class c6, class c7, class c8, class c9) {
  |- wceq(cres(c0, cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), c4)
  -| wcel(c5, cr)
  -| wcel(c2, cr)
  -| wbr(c5, cle, c2)
  -| wcel(c6, universe)
  -| wcel(c7, universe)
  -| wcel(c1, co(c5, cicc, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, co(c5, cicc, c2), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c6, c8))
  -| wi(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wceq(c7, c9))
  -| wi(wcel(cv(s1), c3), wceq(c8, c9))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), c3, c7))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s0, c8)
  -| diffsc(s0, c9)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
} = {
  a1ii(wceq(cres(c0, cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), c4), wcel(c6, universe))
  a1ii(wceq(cres(c0, cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), c4), wcel(c7, universe))
  a1ii(wceq(cres(c0, cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), c4), diffsc(s0, c8))
  a1ii(wceq(cres(c0, cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), c4), diffsc(s0, c9))
  3eqtr4i(cres(c0, cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), c4, cres(cmpo(s0, s1, co(c5, cicc, c2), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  mp2an(wceq(cres(cmpo(s0, s1, co(c5, cicc, c2), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3)), cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))), wss(co(c1, cicc, c2), co(c5, cicc, c2)), wss(c3, c3))
  mp2an(wss(co(c1, cicc, c2), co(c5, cicc, c2)), wcel(c1, co(c5, cicc, c2)), wcel(c2, co(c5, cicc, c2)))
  mp3an(wcel(c2, co(c5, cicc, c2)), wcel(c5, cxr), wcel(c2, cxr), wbr(c5, cle, c2))
  rexri(c5)
  rexri(c2)
  ubicc2(c5, c2)
  iccss2(c1, c5, c2, c2)
  ssid(c3)
  resmpt2(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), co(c5, cicc, c2), c3, c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))
  reseq1i(c0, cxp(co(c1, cicc, c2), c3), cmpo(s0, s1, co(c5, cicc, c2), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  eqtr4i(c4, cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))), cmpo(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), c3, c7))
  mpt2eq3ia(s0, s1, co(c1, cicc, c2), c3, cif(c6, c7, wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), c7)
  ifeqda(c6, c7, c7, wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))
  3eqtr4d(c6, c7, c8, c9, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)))
  ad2antlr(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wceq(c8, c9))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wceq(c6, c8), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  syl(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wceq(c7, c9), wceq(cv(s0), c1))
  mpbir2and(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wceq(cv(s0), c1), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))
  simpr(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))
  ad2antrr(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))
  simp2bi(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2))
  sylancl(wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1)), wb(wceq(cv(s0), c1), wa(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)))), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wcel(c1, cr))
  ad2antrr(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c3), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1), wcel(cv(s0), cr))
  simp1bi(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s0), cr), wbr(c1, cle, cv(s0)), wbr(cv(s0), cle, c2))
  elicc2i(cv(s0), c1, c2)
  ax-mp(wcel(c1, cr), wcel(c1, co(c5, cicc, c2)))
  simp1bi(wcel(c1, co(c5, cicc, c2)), wcel(c1, cr), wbr(c5, cle, c1), wbr(c1, cle, c2))
  elicc2i(c1, c5, c2)
  letri3(cv(s0), c1)
  eqidd(c7, wa(wa(wcel(cv(s0), co(c1, cicc, c2)), wcel(cv(s1), c3)), wn(wbr(cv(s0), cle, c1))))
  diff.co.s(s0, c1, cicc, c2)
  diff.co.s(s0, c5, cicc, c2)
  diff.cicc.s(s0)
  diff.co.s(s1, c1, cicc, c2)
  diff.co.s(s1, c5, cicc, c2)
  diff.cicc.s(s1)
}

blocks.name: cnrehmeo
blocks.content: The canonical bijection from ` ( RR X. RR ) ` to ` CC ` described in ~ cnref1o is in fact a homeomorphism of the usual topologies on these sets. (It is also an isometry, if ` ( RR X. RR ) ` is metrized with the l<SUP>2</SUP> norm.) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 25-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnrehmeo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  |- wcel(c0, co(co(c1, ctx, c1), chmeo, c2))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(s1)))))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
} = {
  mptru(wcel(c0, co(co(c1, ctx, c1), chmeo, c2)))
  sylanbrc(wtru, wcel(c0, co(co(c1, ctx, c1), chmeo, c2)), wcel(c0, co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c2)), wcel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, ccn, co(c1, ctx, c1))))
  syl5eqel(c0, co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c2), cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, co(cv(s0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(s1)))), wtru)
  cnmpt22f(s0, s1, cr, cr, cv(s0), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(s1)), c1, c1, c2, c2, c2, wtru)
  sseldd(cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, cv(s0)), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c2), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, co(c2, crest, cr)), wtru)
  syl6eleq(cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, cv(s0)), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, co(c2, crest, cr)), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c1), wtru)
  cnmpt1st(s0, s1, cr, cr, c1, c1, wtru)
  cnmpt22f(s0, s1, cr, cr, ci, cmul, cv(s1), c1, c1, c2, c2, c2, wtru)
  cnmpt2c(s0, s1, cr, cr, ci, c1, c1, c2, cc, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(ci, cc))
  ax-icn()
  sseldd(cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, cv(s1)), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c2), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, co(c2, crest, cr)), wtru)
  mp1i(wtru, wss(co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, co(c2, crest, cr)), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c2)), wcel(c2, ctop))
  cnfldtop(c2)
  cnrest2r(c2, co(c1, ctx, c1), cr)
  syl6eleq(cmpo(s0, s1, cr, cr, cv(s1)), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, co(c2, crest, cr)), co(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c1), wtru)
  cnmpt2nd(s0, s1, cr, cr, c1, c1, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, cr)))
  eqeltri(c1, cfv(ctopon, cr), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  retopon()
  oveq2i(co(c1, ctx, c1), ccn, c1, co(c2, crest, cr))
  a1i(wtru, wcel(cmul, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
  mulcn(c2)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(caddc, co(co(c2, ctx, c2), ccn, c2)))
  addcn(c2)
  syl5eqel(ccnv(c0), co(c2, ccn, co(c1, ctx, c1)), cmpt(hs0, cc, cop(cfv(cre, cv(hs0)), cfv(cim, cv(hs0)))), wtru)
  cnrecnv(hs0, s0, s1, c0)
  cnmpt1t(hs0, cc, cfv(cre, cv(hs0)), cfv(cim, cv(hs0)), c2, c1, c1, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wcel(c2, cfv(ctopon, cc)))
  syl6eqelr(cmpt(hs0, cc, cfv(cre, cv(hs0))), co(c2, ccn, c1), cre, wtru)
  feqmptd(hs0, cre, cc, cr, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wf(cre, cc, cr))
  ref()
  eleqtri(cre, co(c2, ccn, c1), co(cc, ccncf, cr))
  recncf()
  syl6eqelr(cmpt(hs0, cc, cfv(cim, cv(hs0))), co(c2, ccn, c1), cim, wtru)
  feqmptd(hs0, cim, cc, cr, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, wf(cim, cc, cr))
  imf()
  eleqtri(cim, co(c2, ccn, c1), co(cc, ccncf, cr))
  imcncf()
  mp2an(wceq(co(cc, ccncf, cr), co(c2, ccn, c1)), wss(cc, cc), wss(cr, cc))
  ssid(cc)
  ax-resscn()
  cncfcn(cc, cr, c2, c1, c2)
  toponrestid(c2, cc)
  cnfldtopon(c2)
  eqtri(c1, co(c2, crest, cr), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  tgioo2(c2)
  ishmeo(c0, co(c1, ctx, c1), c2)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.ci.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.ci.s(s1)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.c(cre)
  diff.hs0.c(cim)
}
blocks.pretty:
thm cnrehmeo(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2) {
  ⊢ c0 ∈((c1[tX]c1)[Homeo]c2)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦(s0[+](i[×]s1)))
  ⊣ c1 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ c2 =(TopOpen ` CCfld)
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c2)
  ⊣ d(s1, c2)
} = {
  mptru(c0 ∈((c1[tX]c1)[Homeo]c2))
  sylanbrc(wtru, c0 ∈((c1[tX]c1)[Homeo]c2), c0 ∈((c1[tX]c1)[Cn]c2), `' c0 ∈(c2[Cn](c1[tX]c1)))
  syl5eqel(c0, ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn]c2), (s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦(s0[+](i[×]s1))), wtru)
  cnmpt22f(s0, s1, cr, cr, s0, caddc, (i[×]s1), c1, c1, c2, c2, c2, wtru)
  sseldd((s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦ s0), ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn]c2), ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn](c2[|`t]ℝ)), wtru)
  syl6eleq((s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦ s0), ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn](c2[|`t]ℝ)), ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn]c1), wtru)
  cnmpt1st(s0, s1, cr, cr, c1, c1, wtru)
  cnmpt22f(s0, s1, cr, cr, ci, cmul, s1, c1, c1, c2, c2, c2, wtru)
  cnmpt2c(s0, s1, cr, cr, ci, c1, c1, c2, cc, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, i ∈ ℂ)
  ax-icn()
  sseldd((s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦ s1), ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn]c2), ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn](c2[|`t]ℝ)), wtru)
  mp1i(wtru, ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn](c2[|`t]ℝ))⊆((c1[tX]c1)[Cn]c2), c2 ∈ Top)
  cnfldtop(c2)
  cnrest2r(c2, (c1[tX]c1), cr)
  syl6eleq((s0 ∈ ℝ, s1 ∈ ℝ ↦ s1), ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn](c2[|`t]ℝ)), ((c1[tX]c1)[Cn]c1), wtru)
  cnmpt2nd(s0, s1, cr, cr, c1, c1, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, c1 ∈(TopOn ` ℝ))
  eqeltri(c1, (TopOn ` ℝ), (topGen ` ran((,))))
  retopon()
  oveq2i((c1[tX]c1), ccn, c1, (c2[|`t]ℝ))
  a1i(wtru, × ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
  mulcn(c2)
  a1i(wtru, + ∈((c2[tX]c2)[Cn]c2))
  addcn(c2)
  syl5eqel(`' c0, (c2[Cn](c1[tX]c1)), (hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦ <(Re ` hs0),(Im ` hs0)>), wtru)
  cnrecnv(hs0, s0, s1, c0)
  cnmpt1t(hs0, cc, (Re ` hs0), (Im ` hs0), c2, c1, c1, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, c2 ∈(TopOn ` ℂ))
  syl6eqelr((hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(Re ` hs0)), (c2[Cn]c1), cre, wtru)
  feqmptd(hs0, cre, cc, cr, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, (Re : ℂ → ℝ))
  ref()
  eleqtri(cre, (c2[Cn]c1), (ℂ[-cn->]ℝ))
  recncf()
  syl6eqelr((hs0 ∈ ℂ ↦(Im ` hs0)), (c2[Cn]c1), cim, wtru)
  feqmptd(hs0, cim, cc, cr, wtru)
  a1i(wtru, (Im : ℂ → ℝ))
  imf()
  eleqtri(cim, (c2[Cn]c1), (ℂ[-cn->]ℝ))
  imcncf()
  mp2an((ℂ[-cn->]ℝ)=(c2[Cn]c1), ℂ ⊆ ℂ, ℝ ⊆ ℂ)
  ssid(cc)
  ax-resscn()
  cncfcn(cc, cr, c2, c1, c2)
  toponrestid(c2, cc)
  cnfldtopon(c2)
  eqtri(c1, (c2[|`t]ℝ), (topGen ` ran((,))))
  tgioo2(c2)
  ishmeo(c0, (c1[tX]c1), c2)
  diff.cr.s(s0)
  diff.caddc.s(s0)
  diff.cr.s(s1)
  diff.caddc.s(s1)
  diff.wtru.s(s0)
  diff.wtru.s(s1)
  diff.cmul.s(s0)
  diff.cmul.s(s1)
  diff.ci.s(s0)
  diff.cc.s(s0)
  diff.ci.s(s1)
  diff.cc.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.s(s0)
  diff.hs0.s(s1)
  diff.hs0.c(c0)
  diff.hs0.c(cc)
  diff.hs0.c(c2)
  diff.hs0.c(c1)
  diff.hs0.w(wtru)
  diff.hs0.c(cre)
  diff.hs0.c(cim)
}

blocks.name: cnheiborlem
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ cnheibor . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Sep-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm cnheiborlem(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5) {
  |- wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cle, c2)))), wcel(c3, ccmp))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  -| wceq(c3, co(c1, crest, c0))
  -| wceq(c4, cmpo(s1, s2, cr, cr, co(cv(s1), caddc, co(ci, cmul, cv(s2)))))
  -| wceq(c5, cima(c4, cxp(co(cneg(c2), cicc, c2), co(cneg(c2), cicc, c2))))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c0)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
} = {
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cle, c2)))), wcel(c3, ccmp)), diffsc(s0, c1))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cle, c2)))), wcel(c3, ccmp)), diffsc(s0, c3))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cle, c2)))), wcel(c3, ccmp)), diffsc(s1, c0))
  a1ii(wi(wa(wcel(c0, cfv(ccld, c1)), wa(wcel(c2, cr), wral(s0, c0, wbr(cfv(cabs, cv(s0)), cle, c2)))), wcel(c3, ccmp)), diffsc(s1, c3))

blocks.name: cnheibor
blocks.content: Heine-Borel theorem for complex numbers. A subset of ` CC ` is compact iff it is closed and bounded. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Sep-2014.)

blocks.name: rellycmp
blocks.content: The topology on the reals is locally compact. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 2-Mar-2015.)

blocks.name: bndth
blocks.content: The Boundedness Theorem. A continuous function from a compact topological space to the reals is bounded (above). (Boundedness below is obtained by applying this theorem to ` -u F ` .) (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm bndth(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0)))))
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccmp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))

blocks.name: evth
blocks.content: The Extreme Value Theorem. A continuous function from a nonempty compact topological space to the reals attains its maximum at some point in the domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)
blocks.origin:
thm evth(setvar s0, setvar s1, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))))
  -| wceq(c0, cuni(c2))
  -| wceq(c3, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c2, ccmp))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, co(c2, ccn, c3)))
  -| wi(w0, wne(c0, emptycls))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c0)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c0)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c2)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
} = {
  sylibr(w0, wrex(s0, c0, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))), wn(wral(s0, c0, wn(wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0))))))))
  mtod(w0, wral(s0, c0, wn(wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(c1, cv(s1)), cle, cfv(c1, cv(s0)))))), wf(c1, c0, cdif(cr, csn(csup(crn(c1), cr, clt)))))
  pm2.65da(w0, wf(c1, c0, cdif(cr, csn(csup(crn(c1), cr, clt)))), wrex(s0, cr, wral(s1, c0, wbr(cfv(cmpt(hs0, c0, co(nat1, cdiv, co(csup(crn(c1), cr, clt), cmin, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))), cv(s1)), cle, cv(s0)))))
  bndth(s0, s1, c0, cmpt(hs0, c0, co(nat1, cdiv, co(csup(crn(c1), cr, clt), cmin, cfv(c1, cv(hs0))))), c2, c3, wa(w0, wf(c1, c0, cdif(cr, csn(csup(crn(c1), cr, clt))))))

blocks.name: evth2
blocks.content: The Extreme Value Theorem, minimum version. A continuous function from a nonempty compact topological space to the reals attains its minimum at some point in the domain. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 12-Aug-2014.)

blocks.name: lebnumlem1
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ lebnum . The function ` F ` measures the sum of all of the distances to escape the sets of the cover. Since by assumption it is a cover, there is at least one set which covers a given point, and since it is open, the point is a positive distance from the edge of the set. Thus, the sum is a strictly positive number. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.) (Revised by AV, 30-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: lebnumlem2
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ lebnum . As a finite sum of point-to-set distance functions, which are continuous by ~ metdscn , the function ` F ` is also continuous. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.) (Revised by AV, 30-Sep-2020.)

thm lebnumlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  |- wi(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2)))
  -| wceq(c1, cfv(cmopn, c3))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cmet, c4)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c1, ccmp))
  -| wi(w0, wss(c5, c1))
  -| wi(w0, wceq(c4, cuni(c5)))
  -| wi(w0, wcel(c5, cfn))
  -| wi(w0, wn(wcel(c4, c5)))
  -| wceq(c0, cmpt(s0, c4, csu(s1, c5, cinf(crn(cmpt(s2, cdif(c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)))), cxr, clt))))
  -| wceq(c2, cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  -| diffss(s0, s1)
  -| diffss(s0, s2)
  -| diffss(s1, s2)
  -| diffsc(s0, c1)
  -| diffsc(s0, c3)
  -| diffsc(s0, c4)
  -| diffsc(s0, c5)
  -| diffsc(s1, c1)
  -| diffsc(s1, c3)
  -| diffsc(s1, c4)
  -| diffsc(s1, c5)
  -| diffsc(s2, c1)
  -| diffsc(s2, c3)
  -| diffsc(s2, c4)
  -| diffsc(s2, c5)
  -| diffsw(s0, w0)
  -| diffsw(s1, w0)
  -| diffsw(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl6eleqr(c0, co(c1, ccn, c2), co(c1, ccn, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, cr)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, cr))), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))))
  syl5eqel(c0, co(c1, ccn, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld)), cmpt(s0, c4, csu(s1, c5, cinf(crn(cmpt(s2, cdif(c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)))), cxr, clt))), w0)
  fsumcn(s0, s1, c4, c5, cinf(crn(cmpt(s2, cdif(c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)))), cxr, clt), c1, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), w0)
  syl(w0, wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c4)), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c4)))
  syl3anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wcel(cmpt(s0, c4, cinf(crn(cmpt(s2, cdif(c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)))), cxr, clt)), co(c1, ccn, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))), wcel(c3, cfv(cmet, c4)), wss(cdif(c4, cv(s1)), c4), wne(cdif(c4, cv(s1)), emptycls))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c3, cfv(cmet, c4)))
  difssd(c4, cv(s1), wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5)))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wne(cdif(c4, cv(s1)), emptycls), wss(cv(s1), c4), wne(cv(s1), c4))
  syl2anc(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wss(cv(s1), c4), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c4)), wcel(cv(s1), c1))
  syl(wa(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wcel(c1, cfv(ctopon, c4)), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c4)))
  adantr(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c4)))
  syl(w0, wcel(c3, cfv(cxmet, c4)), wcel(c3, cfv(cmet, c4)))
  metxmet(c3, c4)
  mopntopon(c3, c4, c1)
  sselda(cv(s1), c5, c1, w0)
  toponss(c1, c4, cv(s1))
  imp(w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5), wne(cv(s1), c4))
  necon2ad(cv(s1), c4, w0, wcel(cv(s1), c5))
  syl5ibrcom(w0, wceq(cv(s1), c4), wn(wcel(cv(s1), c5)), wn(wcel(c4, c5)))
  notbid(wceq(cv(s1), c4), wcel(cv(s1), c5), wcel(c4, c5))
  eleq1(cv(s1), c4, c5)

  metdscn2(s0, s2, c3, c4, cdif(c4, cv(s1)), cmpt(s0, c4, cinf(crn(cmpt(s2, cdif(c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)))), cxr, clt)), c1, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  eqid(cmpt(s0, c4, cinf(crn(cmpt(s2, cdif(c4, cv(s1)), co(cv(s0), c3, cv(s2)))), cxr, clt)))
  syl3anc(w0, wb(wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))), wcel(c0, co(c1, ccn, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, cr)))), wcel(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), cfv(ctopon, cc)), wss(crn(c0), cr), wss(cr, cc))
  a1i(w0, wcel(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), cfv(ctopon, cc)))
  cnfldtopon(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  syl6ss(crn(c0), cr, crp, w0)
  frnd(c0, crp, c4, w0)
  lebnumlem1(s0, s1, s2, c0, c4, c1, c3, c5, w0)
  rpssre()
  a1i(w0, wss(cr, cc))
  ax-resscn()
  cnrest2(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), cc, c0, cr, c1)
  oveq2i(c1, ccn, c2, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, cr))
  eqtri(c2, co(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld), crest, cr), cfv(ctg, crn(cioo)))
  tgioo2(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  eqid(cfv(ctopn, ccnfld))
  diff.cfv.s(s0, ctopn, ccnfld)
  diff.ctopn.s(s0)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s0)
  diff.cfv.s(s1, ctopn, ccnfld)
  diff.ctopn.s(s1)
  diff.ccnfld.s(s1)
  diff.cdif.s(s0, c4, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s0, s1)
  diff.cdif.s(s2, c4, cv(s1))
  diff.cv.s(s2, s1)

thm lebnumlem2(setvar s0, setvar s1, setvar s2, class c0, class c1, class c2, class c3, class c4, class c5, wff w0) {
  ⊢ (w0 → c0 ∈(c1[Cn]c2))
  ⊣ c1 =(MetOpen ` c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈(Met ` c4))

  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ⊆ c1)

  ⊣ (w0 → c5 ∈ Fin)
  ⊣ (w0 → ¬ c4 ∈ c5)
  ⊣ c0 =(s0 ∈ c4 ↦ sum(s1 ∈ c5, inf(ran((s2 ∈(c4 \ s1)↦(s0[c3]s2))), ℝ*, <)))
  ⊣ c2 =(topGen ` ran((,)))
  ⊣ d(s0, s1)
  ⊣ d(s0, s2)
  ⊣ d(s1, s2)
  ⊣ d(s0, c1)
  ⊣ d(s0, c3)
  ⊣ d(s0, c4)
  ⊣ d(s0, c5)

  ⊣ d(s1, c5)
  ⊣ d(s2, c1)
  ⊣ d(s2, c3)
  ⊣ d(s2, c4)
  ⊣ d(s2, c5)
  ⊣ d(s0, w0)
  ⊣ d(s1, w0)
  ⊣ d(s2, w0)
} = {
  syl6eleqr(c0, (c1[Cn]c2), (c1[Cn]((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]ℝ)), w0)
  mpbid(w0, c0 ∈(c1[Cn]((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]ℝ)), c0 ∈(c1[Cn](TopOpen ` CCfld)))
  syl5eqel(c0, (c1[Cn](TopOpen ` CCfld)), (s0 ∈ c4 ↦ sum(s1 ∈ c5, inf(ran((s2 ∈(c4 \ s1)↦(s0[c3]s2))), ℝ*, <))), w0)
  fsumcn(s0, s1, c4, c5, inf(ran((s2 ∈(c4 \ s1)↦(s0[c3]s2))), ℝ*, <), c1, (TopOpen ` CCfld), w0)
  syl(w0, c1 ∈(TopOn ` c4), c3 ∈(*Met ` c4))
  syl3anc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c5), (s0 ∈ c4 ↦ inf(ran((s2 ∈(c4 \ s1)↦(s0[c3]s2))), ℝ*, <))∈(c1[Cn](TopOpen ` CCfld)), c3 ∈(Met ` c4), (c4 \ s1)⊆ c4, (c4 \ s1)≠ ∅)
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ c5, c3 ∈(Met ` c4))
  difssd(c4, s1, (w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c5))
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c5), (c4 \ s1)≠ ∅, s1 ⊆ c4, s1 ≠ c4)
  syl2anc((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c5), s1 ⊆ c4, c1 ∈(TopOn ` c4), s1 ∈ c1)
  syl((w0 ∧ s1 ∈ c5), c1 ∈(TopOn ` c4), c3 ∈(*Met ` c4))
  adantr(w0, s1 ∈ c5, c3 ∈(*Met ` c4))
  syl(w0, c3 ∈(*Met ` c4), c3 ∈(Met ` c4))
  metxmet(c3, c4)

  sselda(s1, c5, c1, w0)

  syl5ibrcom(w0, s1 = c4, ¬ s1 ∈ c5, ¬ c4 ∈ c5)
  notbid(s1 = c4, s1 ∈ c5, c4 ∈ c5)
  eleq1(s1, c4, c5)

  eqid((s0 ∈ c4 ↦ inf(ran((s2 ∈(c4 \ s1)↦(s0[c3]s2))), ℝ*, <)))
  syl3anc(w0, (c0 ∈(c1[Cn](TopOpen ` CCfld))↔ c0 ∈(c1[Cn]((TopOpen ` CCfld)[|`t]ℝ))), (TopOpen ` CCfld)∈(TopOn ` ℂ), ran(c0)⊆ ℝ, ℝ ⊆ ℂ)

blocks.name: lebnumlem3
blocks.content: Lemma for ~ lebnum . By the previous lemmas, ` F ` is continuous and positive on a compact set, so it has a positive minimum ` r ` . Then setting ` d = r / # ( U ) ` , since for each ` u e. U ` we have ` ball ( x , d ) C_ u ` iff ` d <_ d ( x , X \ u ) ` , if ` -. ball ( x , d ) C_ u ` for all ` u ` then summing over ` u ` yields ` sum_ u e. U d ( x , X \ u ) = F ( x ) < sum_ u e. U d = r ` , in contradiction to the assumption that ` r ` is the minimum of ` F ` . (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.) (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2015.) (Revised by AV, 30-Sep-2020.)

blocks.name: lebnum
blocks.content: The Lebesgue number lemma, or Lebesgue covering lemma. If ` X ` is a compact metric space and ` U ` is an open cover of ` X ` , then there exists a positive real number ` d ` such that every ball of size ` d ` (and every subset of a ball of size ` d ` , including every subset of diameter less than ` d ` ) is a subset of some member of the cover. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.) (Proof shortened by Mario Carneiro, 5-Sep-2015.) (Proof shortened by AV, 30-Sep-2020.)

  ⊣ c3 =(MetOpen ` c2)
  ⊣ (w0 → c2 ∈(*Met ` c0))
  ⊣ (w0 → c3 ∈ Comp)
  ⊣ (w0 → c1 ⊆ c3)
  ⊣ (w0 → c0 = ⋃ c1)

  ⊣ d(s1, s2)

  ⊣ d(s2, w0)

blocks.name: lebnumii
blocks.content: Specialize the Lebesgue number lemma ~ lebnum to the closed unit interval. (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 14-Feb-2015.)
